Text: Woops. The Poster snap shot is wrong! xD

@xenoFLASH
They are soft subs and didnt want to go to encoding all over again for hardcoded subs. This is mainly ment for Apple TV and apple products. You can use handbrake if you'ld like to hardcode the subs. :p

I have handbreak, the only problem I have with it is keeping the resolution the same. I end up ruining the movie. aaugh
Any help would be greatly appreciated. unless the suggestion is to eat a bullet. i just don't see how that would work. :D
Thanks for coming back. Glad you got this movie up!
